CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("/00T/e?who_id=" + Id + "&what_id=" + AccountId + "&retURL=/" + Id + "&tsk5=Left Message with " + FirstName + " " + LastName + "&tsk4=" + TEXT(DAY(TODAY())) + "/" + TEXT(MONTH(TODAY())) + "/" + TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())) + "&tsk12=Completed", IMAGE("/resource/trac_QuickActions/Mail.png", "LVM") , "_parent")
CustomField.label: LVM
